meanings.definition: Waste material left after the extraction of ore or coal.
meanings.sent1: The miners piled up the tailings near the mine entrance.
meanings.sent2: The tailings from the factory were carefully disposed of to prevent environmental harm.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon thought the tailings were a great place to find shiny rocks.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned tailings resembled a barren wasteland, devoid of life.
meanings.sent5: The tailings formed a dusty trail leading back to the old mine shaft.
